item.title: GitHub Actions | Fix "Error: Dependencies lock file is not found"
item.description: GitHub Actions | Fix Error: Dependencies lock file is not found Question How to fix this error: Error: Dependencies lock file is not found in /path/to/project. Supported file patterns: package-lock.json,yarn.lock in actions/setup-node@v2 GitHub Action? Answer This error occurs because by default, this job searches for package-lock.json in the root of the repository for caching. We need to explicitly specify the location of our package-lock.json - name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v2 with: node-version: 16.
